mapper.insert: insert into codeworld_product_sku ( t_product_sku_id, t_product_id, t_product_sku_title, t_product_sku_price, t_product_sku_own_spec, t_product_sku_images, t_product_sku_create_time, t_product_sku_update_time ) values ( #{id}, #{productId}, #{title}, #{price}, #{ownSpec}, #{images}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} );
mapper.select: select cds.t_product_sku_id AS id, cds.t_product_sku_title AS title, cds.t_product_sku_price AS price, cds.t_product_sku_images AS images, cds.t_product_sku_own_spec AS ownSpec from codeworld_product_sku AS cds where cds.t_product_id = #{productId}
